definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: In their minds, is the Robin Hood-like bandit hero.
sentences.chinese: 在他们的头脑里，强盗就是劫富济贫的英雄好汉。

sentences.english: And you'll finally see the truth that a hero lies in you.
sentences.chinese: 最终你会发现，自己才是真正的英雄好汉。

sentences.english: There never was a hero who did not have his bounds.
sentences.chinese: 从来就没有胆大包天的英雄好汉。

sentences.english: They were ninety heroes dressed in mail .
sentences.chinese: 他们一共是九十个穿锁子甲的英雄好汉。

sentences.english: How many heroes of the body makes more strong backbone of the Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 多少英雄好汉的躯体使得中华民族的脊梁更加坚挺。

definition: true hero of Greenwood (refers to popular hero in Robin Hood style)
lit. to intervene when one sees an injustice (idiom)/fig. to rush to the rescue/to play the white knight
pinyin: lu4 jian4 bu4 ping2 , ba2 dao1 xiang1 zhu4

definition: place in Hubei, the starting point for a major rebellion at the end of Western Han/also pr. [Lu:4 lin2]
to break into a house for robbery (idiom)
